title: Sausages braised with smoky bacon and cider
directions: Step 1 Heat 1 tbsp oil in a casserole. Add the sausages and cook until browned all over. Take out of the pan.

Step 2 Add the bacon and onion to the pan and cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden. Sprinkle over the flour and cook for 1 minute, then stir in the cider. SimmerÂ for 2 minutes, then stir in the mustard.
Step 3 Add back the sausages. Simmer for 20-30 minutes until sauce has thickened. Add the parsley and serve with mash.
